mainTitle: Channel Your Hobby and Develop Your Photography Skills!
mainDesc: Do you love photography and want to improve your skills while earning extra income? Join Yogzan!
workflowDesc: Register yourself to become a Yogzan collaborator through the provided form.

workflow.title: Receive Task
workflow.desc: Our team will contact you with detailed information about the project you will be working on.

workflow.title: Shoot and Submit
workflow.desc: After the photo or video session, send all results to Yogzan via Yogzan's cloud storage access.

workflow.title: Receive Commission
workflow.desc: After we receive the photos, please wait to receive your commission within 1 to 2 days.

joinDesc: We can't wait to get to know you better, please fill out the form below!

chooseUs.title: Flexible Time
chooseUs.desc: Have another job? No worries! You can work on each project whenever you're ready.

chooseUs.title: Widespread Clients
chooseUs.desc: Yogzan has many clients spread across major cities in Indonesia. Take projects wherever you are!

chooseUs.title: Shoot. Submit. Get Paid
chooseUs.desc: You just need to execute in the field, submit the results, and get your commission. We'll handle the rest.

chooseUs.title: Develop Your Skills
chooseUs.desc: With many projects at Yogzan, you'll gain lots of experience to produce the best images. Get special training from Yogzan to improve your skills!
